issue.title: Novatech DDS9m digital-gate being inappropriately held to DDS table pseudoclock

content.raw: The most recent merge commit in labscript was a bugfix to some timing code. If you are up-to-date in labscript, you might try reverting to the last commit in the default branch before that merge, in case that change caused a regression affecting your scripts.
content.html: The most recent merge commit in labscript was a bugfix to some timing code. If you are up-to-date in labscript, you might try reverting to the last commit in the default branch before that merge, in case that change caused a regression affecting your scripts.
